channel.title: Comments on: New book published: The [R]evolution of Open Science

item.title: By: protohedgehog
item.dc:creator: protohedgehog
item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://fossilsandshit.com/new-book-published-the-revolution-of-open-science/#comment-6538">giacomo</a>.
Way ahead of you ;) http://fossilsandshit.com/the-revolution-of-open-science-all-chapters-available-for-free/
I thought that $3 for all of the massive amount of work that went into it would be see as a reasonable price...
item.content:encoded:
In reply to giacomo.

Way ahead of you üòâ http://fossilsandshit.com/the-revolution-of-open-science-all-chapters-available-for-free/

I thought that $3 for all of the massive amount of work that went into it would be see as a reasonable price…
